Package org.greatage.ioc.coerce

This package represents all coercion related classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Coercion<S,T> This interface represents type converter that converts values from configured source class to target class.
CoercionProvider This interface represents TypeCoercer configuration point that provides Coercion instances by supported source and target coercion classes.
TypeCoercer This interface represents type coercer service that converts source values to specified target class.
 

Class Summary
AbstractCoercion<S,T> This class represents abstract Coercion implementation that defines source and target classes in its constructor.
BooleanToStringCoercion This class represents Coercion implementation that converts values from boolean to string.
DefaultCoercionProvider This class represents CoercionProvider that can be configured with multiply Coercion instances.
EnumToStringCoercion This class represents Coercion implementation that converts enum constants to string.
NumberToStringCoercion This class represents Coercion implementation that converts values from number to string.
StringToBooleanCoercion This class represents Coercion implementation that converts values from string to boolean.
StringToDoubleCoercion This class represents Coercion implementation that converts values from string to double.
StringToEnumCoercion<E extends Enum<E>> This class represents Coercion implementation that converts values from string to enum constant.
StringToEnumCoercionProvider This class represents CoercionProvider implementation that provides coercions for string to enum constant coercions.
StringToIntegerCoercion This class represents Coercion implementation that converts values from string to integer.
TypeCoercerImpl This class represents default TypeCoercer implementation that are configurable with CoercionProvider instances.
 

Exception Summary
CoerceException This class represents exception that is thrown by Coercion implementations if error occurs while converting value.
 

Package org.greatage.ioc.coerce Description

This package represents all coercion related classes.
